entry.title: Rip Current Statement issued April 01 at 8:35PM AST until April 03 at 6:00AM AST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Life-threatening rip currents due to breaking waves around 6 feet and occasionally higher. * WHERE...Beaches of Rincon and Aguada, north coast of St. Thomas and the eastern tip of St. Croix.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:04PM CDT until April 03 at 4:06AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Babcock affecting Wood County. For the Yellow River...including Babcock...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING...

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 9:03PM CDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Pittsville affecting Wood County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Yellow River at Pittsville.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:55PM CDT until further notice by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Kewaunee River near Kewaunee affecting Kewaunee County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kewaunee River near Kewaunee.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:29PM CDT until April 02 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River at Black River Falls affecting Jackson County. .The combination of rainfall from Friday and snow melt has caused moderate flooding along the Black River at Black River Falls, WI. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING...

entry.title: Flood Watch issued April 01 at 8:24PM CDT until April 05 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The Flood Watch continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Black River Near Galesville affecting Trempealeau and La Crosse zones. .The combination of rainfall from Friday and snow melt may cause the Black River at Galesville, WI to rise above its 12 foot minor flood stage as soon as late Sunday night.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:19PM CDT until April 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Yellow River at Necedah affecting Juneau County. .The combination of rainfall from Friday and snow melt will cause the Yellow River at Necedah, WI to rise above its 15 foot minor flood stage on Sunday evening.

entry.title: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 4:40PM CDT until April 02 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...The National Weather Service in Green Bay WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Oconto River above Oconto affecting Oconto County. For the Oconto River...including Oconto...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
